attributes.additional_details: the nation needs such actions in times of national stress. selfless action for the benefit of the frontline staff in the NHS.
attributes.background: HMG to debate awarding Capt Tom a knighthood for his inspirational actions raising funds for NHS staff.

rejection.details:
In any case we can't publish petitions calling for people to receive an honour. 

You can find out more about the honours process and how to nominate someone at www.gov.uk/honours
